EmailTemplate.textOnly:
***Here is the latest information on contacts for Sales Opportunities. Please send an email to the appropriate email alias according to the region.
For EMEA: emea_isr@pivotal.io For EMEA Theatre: All inquiries should be sent directly to, emea_isr@pivotal.io. Andrea Carli is the ISR manager for EMEA, and will ensure that the inquiry is followed up on.
For APJ Theatre:
For Chinese Customer ONLY all inquiries should be sent directly to: Sherlyn Wan <sherlyn.wan@gominemail.cn>, Andy Cui <andy.cui@gominemail.cn>, Lisa Liu <lisa.liu@gominemail.cn> and cc Cindy Chen <cchen@pivotal.io>. They will then distribute to the appropriate in country team members for follow up.
All OTHER APJK inquiries should be sent directly to Jade Tan <jtan@pivotal.io> . Jade will then distribute to the appropriate in country team members for follow up.
For AMER Theatre: Please forward all requests for the AMER theatre directly to the ISR-internal@pivotal.io. All of the ISR team members in Americas are listed on this DL and the rep assigned to that account and/or territory will claim it and respond accordingly within the 48 hour window. ***
